A new verification link has been sent to: Nyowani yekusimbisa link yatumirwa kune email kero yawakapa panguva yekunyoresa.
Yekusimbisa link itsva yatumirwa kuemail yako.
A reset link will be sent if the account: Iyo reset link ichatumirwa kana iyo account iripo.
Are you sure you want to delete your acc: Une chokwadi chekuti unoda kudzima account yako?
Click here to re-send the verification e: Dzvanya apa kuti utumire zvakare email yekuongorora.
Delete your account and all of its resou: Delete account yako uye zvese zvezvinhu zvayo
Each recovery code can be used once to a: Each recovery code can be used once to access your account and will be removed after use. If you need more, click Regenerate Codes above.
Ensure your account is using a long, ran: Simbisa kuti account yako iri kushandisa nguva yakareba, yakasarudzika kuti ugare wakachengeteka
Enter the 6-digit code from your authent: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.
Enter the authentication code provided b: Enter the authentication code provided by your authenticator application.
Enter your details below to create your: Isa yako nhoroondo pazasi kuti ugadzire yako account
Enter your email and password below to l: Isa yako email uye password pazasi kuti ipinde mukati
Enter your email to receive a password r: Isa yako email kuti ugamuchire password reset link

Once your account is deleted, all of its: Kamwe account yako kana yakabviswa, zvese zvayo zviwanikwa uye data zvichaderedzwa zvachose. Ndokumbira usimbise kuti iwe ungade kudzima zvachose account yako.
Kana account yako yadzimwa, zvese zviwanikwa zvayo uye data zvichabviswa zvachose. Ndokumbira uise password yako kuratidza kuti unoda kudzima zvachose account yako.
Please confirm access to your account by: Please confirm access to your account by entering one of your emergency recovery codes.
Please enter your new password below: Ndokumbira utore password yako nyowani pazasi
Please verify your email address by clic: Ndokumbira utarise yako email kero nekudzvanya pane iyo link yatoratidza kwauri iwe.
Recovery codes let you regain access if: Recovery codes let you regain access if you lose your 2FA device. Store them in a secure password manager.
This is a secure area of the application: Iyi inzvimbo yakachengetedzeka yekushandisa. Ndokumbira usimbise password yako usati waenderera.
To finish enabling two-factor authentica: To finish enabling two-factor authentication, scan the QR code or enter the setup key in your authenticator app.
Two-factor authentication is now enabled: Two-factor authentication is now enabled. Scan the QR code or enter the setup key in your authenticator app.
Update your name and email address: Gadziridza zita rako uye email kero
When you enable two-factor authenticatio: When you enable two-factor authentication, you will be prompted for a secure pin during login. This pin can be retrieved from a TOTP-supported application on your phone.
With two-factor authentication enabled,: With two-factor authentication enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random pin during login, which you can retrieve from the TOTP-supported application on your phone.
